General.Name: Atenor SA
General.Description: Atenor SA, a real estate development company, invests in large-scale real estate projects in Belgium, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, France, Germany, Portugal, Poland, Hungary, the United Kingdom, and Romania. The company develops real estate projects, such as offices and residential buildings. Atenor SA was founded in 1910 and is headquartered in La Hulpe, Belgium.
General.Address: Avenue Reine Astrid 92, La Hulpe, Belgium, 1310
